name: Castanea vesca
Relationship: Compare: Pertussin - Whooping-cough (when symptoms return again after being allayed. Dros.; Mephitis; Naphtha.; Ammon. brom.
details: A useful remedy in WHOOPING-COUGH, especially in the early stage, with dry, ringing, violent, spasmodic cough. Desire for warm drinks. Very thirsty. Loss of appetite. Diarrhoea. Thick urine. Lumbago, weak back, can hardly straighten up.
